output.sentences: I was in nyc and decided to head to china town
I wanted the most authentic experience possible, so I changed some money and got these neat looking coins!
I had trouble deciding which food to eat, because it all looked awesome.
After pushing my way to a quiet place to eat, I looked around for some dessert, and spotted pretty interesting options.
On my way out, I saw a place selling cute miniatures, and decided to buy some as a souveneir for my friends back home.
